house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1951 has 4 bedroom(s), 4 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) and approximately 3586 square feet of living area. Rooms include family room. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, french doors.
house_listing.firm_name: Fortune Internatio Fortune Internatio Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dishwasher, Foyer, French Doors, OutdoorLights
